nodes.text: Star Wars: Creatures Big & Small is a canon young-readers book. It was written by Calliope Glass and Caitlin Kennedy, and published by Disney–Lucasfilm Press on October 1, 2019.

Celebrating the cute, fun-and sometimes ferocious-animals from a galaxy far, far away, Star Wars Creatures Big & Small continues Katie Cook's adorable run of rhyming primers for Padawans and their parents.
